hook.text: What if I told you that everything in the universe follows just four simple rules?

intro.text: These are the laws of thermodynamics. The rules that govern energy in our universe.

zeroth_law.text: The zeroth law. If two systems are in thermal equilibrium with a third system, they are in equilibrium with each other. This is how we measure temperature.

first_law.text: The first law. Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed. The total energy of an isolated system always remains constant.

second_law.text: The second law. Entropy always increases. Heat flows from hot to cold, never the reverse without external work. This is why time moves forward.

third_law.text: The third law. As temperature approaches absolute zero, entropy approaches a minimum. But you can never actually reach absolute zero.

outro.text: These four laws explain everything from why ice melts to why stars shine. Follow for more science!
